afest.datastructures.tree.decision

Class Forest<R extends java.io.Serializable,C extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • afest.datastructures.tree.decision.Forest<R,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - Type used to identify features.
    C - Type of objects returned by the decision trees.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Forest<R extends java.io.Serializable,C extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Forest class to create an Ensemble classifier from Decision trees.
